caption.p: Climate change and health publications according to health impact studied in PubMed, 1990â€“2014. Categories of health impacts are taken from the 5th IPCC report, and the climate-related health outcomes given there are used as key words. Effects of extreme events result from extreme heat, flooding, and storms. Infectious diseases include vector-borne, water-borne, and food-borne diseases. Respiratory diseases encompass effects of air pollution, asthma, and allergies. Other effects of climate change on health include occupational health, mental health effects, migration, and conflict.
